summary: A test suite that verifies the core functionality, performance optimizations, and configuration handling of the Stable Audio generation pipeline, covering component initialization, input handling, model saving/loading, CPU offloading, attention mechanisms, and various generation parameters such as negative prompts and waveform specifications.
business_intent: Provide automated regression testing to ensure the audio generation pipeline operates reliably across different settings, enabling faster development cycles, higher product quality, and confidence in releasing stable audio features.
